Dear Ashok,

Thank you very much for the revised quotation.

I propose we set up a proposal defence session for Monday, March 24, from 3:15 PM to 4:00 PM. We can do an in-person meeting at HO1 if that suits you. Otherwise, MS Teams would be fine as well.

I would also recommend that you provide more details on:

chunks.text:
I propose we set up a proposal defence session for Monday, March 24, from 3:15 PM to 4:00 PM. We can do an in-person meeting at HO1 if that suits you. Otherwise, MS Teams would be fine as well.

I would also recommend that you provide more details on:


*	
	What exactly is included as part of the incident response services, as the brochure is vague.
*	
	Confirmation on whether we can elect to use Google Mandiant for certain and/or all elements of the post-incident response. If so, would this impact anything in terms of pricing, conditions of declaration, billing, etc.?
*	
	Please provide the securitization details and the respective financial strength and credit rating information.
*	
	For the management liability exclusion, please advise if this is already covered under our D&O policy.


Dear @Dee Deu <mailto:dee.deu@chalhoub.com> / @Hamid Ahmadi <mailto:Hamid.Ahmadi@chalhoub.com> ,

Hope you are well.

Appreciate if you can reasonably provide some details on the below.



Also, if there are any questions you have beforehand or topics you would like to discuss during the meeting, please inform Nasco in advance to facilitate an efficient and productive discussion.

Appreciate it if you can accommodate the Monday meeting timing, as it is important to finalize this exercise by the end of the month.​

Thank You & Best regards,  
Hagop

________________________________

HAGOP GHAZARIAN​​​​

SPECIALIST ‑ ADMINISTRATION

M.C.T. FZE

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

+971 4 8045000

From: Ashok Eapen
Sent: Tuesday, 18 March 2025 1:16 PM
To: Dee Deu <dee.deu@chalhoub.com>; Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
Cc: Hrishikesh Oturkar <Hrishikesh.Oturkar@nascodubai.com>; Diana Haydar <Diana.Haydar@nascodubai.com>; Hamid Ahmadi <Hamid.Ahmadi@chalhoub.com>; Nadeem Semaan <Nadeem.Semaan@chalhoub.com>; Sandeep Kamath <Sandeep.Kamath@nascodubai.com>
Subject: RE: Nasco x Chalhoub - Cyber Insurance - Claims experience and discussion
Importance: High

 

Dear Hagop,

 

Trust you are well.

 

In continuation to your discussion with Mr. Saba Nader, Group CEO of Nasco; we are pleased to provide you with a revised premium of US$ 275,000+ VAT. We have been able to get this done on an exceptional basis from the insurer considering our long-standing relationship. As indicated previously, please find below the details of the carriers:

 

*	Insurer: Orient Takaful (A.M Best A rated)
*	Reinsurer: 100% by CFC London (capacity providers are rated A or better by S&P, AM Best, Fitch etc.)
*	A note on CFC’s cyber capabilities: Cyber Services | CFC <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/R-5uCE6noUp5oq6cZt6U7DqYa?domain=cfc.com/> 
*	CFC was rated Cyber insurance carrier of the year 2024 and cyber claims team of the year 2024 (both in Europe)
*	As mentioned in my previous email, there will be no deductible on initial incident response costs

 

Please let us know in case of any further clarifications that is required on the same.

 

Thanks and regards,

 

Ashok Peter Eapen Dip CII, FRM

Regional Director, General Insurance (Financial Lines & Engineering)

Dear Dee,

 

With reference to my discussion with Hagop regards to the deductible mentioned on the policy, the reinsurers backing Orient have confirmed the below:

 

*	There will be no deductible on initial incident response costs as mentioned in attached brochure
*	Other cover elements are subject to the deductible

 



 

Trust this assist.

 

Thanks and regards,

 

Ashok Peter Eapen Dip CII, FRM

Regional Director, General Insurance (Financial Lines & Engineering)

From: Ashok Eapen
Sent: Monday, 10 March 2025 5:13 PM
To: Dee Deu <dee.deu@chalhoub.com <mailto:dee.deu@chalhoub.com> >
Cc: Hrishikesh Oturkar <Hrishikesh.Oturkar@nascodubai.com <mailto:Hrishikesh.Oturkar@nascodubai.com> >; Diana Haydar <Diana.Haydar@nascodubai.com <mailto:Diana.Haydar@nascodubai.com> >; Hamid Ahmadi <Hamid.Ahmadi@chalhoub.com <mailto:Hamid.Ahmadi@chalhoub.com> >; Nadeem Semaan <Nadeem.Semaan@chalhoub.com <mailto:Nadeem.Semaan@chalhoub.com> >; Sandeep Kamath <Sandeep.Kamath@nascodubai.com <mailto:Sandeep.Kamath@nascodubai.com> >; Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com> >
Subject: RE: Nasco x Chalhoub - Cyber Insurance - Claims experience and discussion

 

Dear Dee,

 

Trust this email finds you well. Please find attached the revised quotation from Orient Takaful Insurance (backed by A rated Markets who have very reputable and experienced team handling professionally cyber insurance for a long time).

 

The subjectivities are as below:

 

i.                         Pre-placement of insurance:

	*	Confirmation that the EDR solution is deployed across all endpoints and servers on the network

chunks.text:
Trust this email finds you well. Please find attached the revised quotation from Orient Takaful Insurance (backed by A rated Markets who have very reputable and experienced team handling professionally cyber insurance for a long time).

 

The subjectivities are as below:

 

i.                         Pre-placement of insurance:

	*	Confirmation that the EDR solution is deployed across all endpoints and servers on the network

	*	Please provide an overview of your use of network segmentation geographically, between different brands and business functions

	*	Please provide an overview of your backup processes and confirm that they are offline/cloud based and immutable

	*	Please provide an overview of your patching processes and in particular, how you deploy critical patches across the network

	*	Confirmation that the answers in the app are applicable to all locations and entities to be covered

	*	Please provide details of all subsidiaries, employees, physical locations, IT services hosted and revenue derived from Russia, Ukraine and Belarus.

	*	Given the time which has passed since receiving the initial application we would need an NCD completed prior to binding.

ii.                      Post placement of insurance:

*                 Confirmation that cyber security awareness training is in place for all employees

*                 Please provide an estimate of the total number of servers and endpoints on your network

*                 Confirmation that cyber security awareness training is in place for all employees

*                 Please provide an estimate of the total number of servers and endpoints on your network

 

The reinsurers have noted the declaration pertaining to all the incidents. They have asked if there any other losses/or incidents in the last 5 years.

 

Look forward to hearing from you.

 

Thanks and regards,

 

Ashok Peter Eapen Dip CII, FRM

Regional Director, General Insurance (Financial Lines & Engineering)
